name: A Walk in the Dark (itch) (TheGamer)
description:
This is a game for the No Video Jam.

You will be guided to escape from the hideous monster who is going to eat you anytime soon. Will you escape or die trying?

Controls: Arrow keys

Programmer: TheGamer
Voice Actors: HannahDoesVO, KevinHF, and YeahEliral

Cave background sound
Track: ATMO EERIE Cave, Water Drips, Emptyness, Howling Interior Wind, Oppressive, LOOP
Library: Articulated Sounds - Ghosts Return
Taken from: Sonniss.com GDC 2019 - Game Audio Bundle
License at: https://sonniss.com/gdc-bundle-license/
